data1.Description: A version of the specified software (stack, engine, template, module, etc.)
Defines if new nodes upon horizontal scaling should be clones of a layer’s master (true) or created from scratch (false)
Lists ports from the EXPOSE directive of the image’s dockerfile, which were opened via container firewall during the environment creation.
Manages the auto-redirect functionality state with an ability to define the required port manually.
A short hostname for a master node within a layer.
A unique node identifier of a master node within a layer.
An internal IP address of a master node within a layer.
A script (or link to it) to be executed after environment creation.
Specifies custom ports, which should be opened in the firewall during container creation.
A default shell variable, with a list of paths to directories with executable programs.
The name of the current stack.
The home directory of the stack.
The name of the stack’s default user.
